title: Sustainable Agriculture at Fickle Creek Farm

tasks.task: Describe the tasks related to operating a sustainable, small-scale farm.
subtasks: Raising livestock (chickens, pigs, sheep, ducks) for various purposes.
Managing agroforestry practices, including forested areas and woodland grazing.
Controlling weeds and pests through natural methods (chickens for insect control, ducks for slugs, pigs for understory clearing).
Utilizing farm animals for fertilization, crop residue management, and soil health improvement.
Selling produce and livestock directly to customers.
Heating the farm home with firewood from on-site trees.
Adhering to sustainable practices and maintaining a farm conservation easement.
